title: AI/ML roadmap for beginners
author: Prabhleen Singh
headline: A 2025 guide to leveraging AI/ML for smarter, faster, and more innovative solutions.
content:
Overview

The field of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) is rapidly transforming our world, from self-driving cars to personalized medicine. If you're intrigued by the potential of AI and eager to embark on a learning journey, this roadmap can serve as your guide.

Level: Beginner
Duration: Self Paced
Date: 2025-01-07

Chapters

Foundations

Building a strong foundation in mathematics and programming is crucial for a successful AI/ML journey.

Mathematics for AI/ML

Learn essential mathematical concepts like linear algebra, calculus, and probability.

Khan Academy - Linear Algebra 3Blue1Brown - Essence of Calculus StatQuest with Josh Starmer - Probability & Statistics

Python Programming Fundamentals

Learn the fundamentals of Python programming, including data structures, control flow, and object-oriented programming.

Codecademy - Learn Python 3 FreeCodeCamp - Python for Beginners Automate the Boring Stuff with Python

Core Machine Learning Concepts

Explore fundamental machine learning concepts and algorithms.

Supervised Learning

Learn about algorithms that learn from labeled data, such as regression, classification, and decision trees.

Google Machine Learning Crash Course Scikit-learn Documentation

Unsupervised Learning

Delve into algorithms that uncover patterns and structures in unlabeled data, such as clustering and dimensionality reduction.

Stanford CS229 - Machine Learning Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn, Keras & TensorFlow

Deep Learning

Explore the world of neural networks, which are powerful models inspired by the human brain.

Deep Learning Specialization by Andrew Ng (Coursera) Fast.ai

Hands-on Projects & Practice

Apply your knowledge and gain practical experience through projects.

Kaggle Competitions

Participate in Kaggle competitions to apply your skills and learn from others.

Visit Kaggle

Personal Projects

Work on personal projects that interest you, such as building a recommendation system or an image classifier.

Continuous Learning

Stay updated with the latest advancements in the field of AI/ML.

Follow AI/ML Researchers and Influencers

Stay informed about the latest research and trends.

Read AI/ML Blogs and Publications

Keep up-to-date with the latest advancements in the field.

Attend AI/ML Conferences and Meetups

Network with other AI/ML professionals and learn from experts.
